channel.title: Client error
channel.description:
I have changed the ips in the client.java files to my servers ip, and when i use a server status checker it says my server is online, however when myself or others try and log in to my server they get "error connecting to server", if i change the ips to 127.0.0.1 i can log in, but ovbiously no one else can, any help? :)
Anyhelp on here or skype is appreciated - skype - thewillrs

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

Change to the no-ip it would be the same as connecting to local host + others cant connect

Read full topic

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @xd_own3d_xd xd own3d xd
item.description:
@xd_own3d_xd wrote:

aaah ok, so i change all the ips in the client.java files and the gui.java files to my no-ip for the client that others use?

Read full topic

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

nobody responds in client help section lol. Use 127.0.0.1 for your client, and everybody else has to use the ip that you have set in no-ip

Read full topic

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @Adobe Adobe
item.description:
@Adobe wrote:

metal k0:

try changing the ip in gui.java

If that doesn’t work paste it where it should have been originally pasted: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,138.0.html (client help) people would respond faster due to it’s a client file problem. :rolleyes:

Read full topic
